title: ThunderBird won't open Excel attachments. It tries using wordpad.
content:
I can't open my Excel attachments in ThunderBird.

Is there a setting I need to open. The one I use by default only gives me word, wordpad options. or choose my own, which is still word and wordpad.

Thanks for any help. 

   -=Mark=-

I'm using ThunderBird 115.7.0 and Windows 10.
